articles.title: Premier Makes Field Survey of Farming in S. Hwanghae Province
articles.content:
Premier Makes Field Survey of Farming in S. Hwanghae Province 
						
 Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- Premier of the DPRK Cabinet Pak Pong Ju made a field survey of the farming in Pudok Co-op Farm of Jaeryong County, Oguk Co-op Farm of Anak County and Jangryon and Kwanhae Co-op farms of Unryul County in South Hwanghae Province. 
					 Officials in the field of agriculture and farmers of the province are taking good care of fields despite bad weather conditions in the rainy season, keeping in mind their responsibility for agricultural front, a main front for building an economic power. 
					
					 The premier learned in detail about the fertilizer supply and application and encouraged exemplary officials and farmers before holding a consultative meeting. 
					
					 The meeting stressed the need to boost the enthusiasm of agricultural workers to meet the demand of the sub-workteam management system and drastically increase the grain production to solve the food shortage. 
					
					 It was mentioned at the meeting that agricultural science research organs should carry out the Party's policy for bringing about a radical turn in seed improvement in order to breed high yielding species suited to the climatic and soil conditions of the country. 
					
					 The meeting took measures for the State Planning Commission, ministries and national institutions to fully provide fertilizers, fuel and other materials needed for farming.

articles.title: Chinese in Yanji Arrives to Tour Mt. Kumgang
articles.content:
Chinese in Yanji Arrives to Tour Mt. Kumgang 
						
 Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- A group of Chinese in Yanji to tour Mt. Kumgang led by Pak Ryong Bom arrived here by plane on Sunday.
					 The group will tour the scenic spots on the east coast and Mt. Kumgang, a world-famous scenic spot, and various places of Pyongyang and Kaesong City.

articles.title: Romanian Party Delegation Visits Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Romanian Party Delegation Visits Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
						
 Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Socialist Party of Romania led by Chairman of the Supreme Council Vasile Orleanu visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill to pay tribute to them on Sunday. 
					 The members of the delegation laid a bouquet before the statues and paid respects for them.

articles.title: DPRK Football Team Beats Its S. Korean Rival 2:1
articles.content:
DPRK Football Team Beats Its S. Korean Rival 2:1
						
 Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- The DPRK female football team beat its south Korean rival 2:1 in Sunday's match of the 2013 East Asian Cup which started in south Korea on Saturday.
					 The contest brought together the teams from the DPRK, China, Japan and south Korea. Their league matches will run through July 27.
					
					 The DPRK team will play its second match with the Japanese rival on July 25.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Decisive Factor in Winning Victory in War
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Decisive Factor in Winning Victory in War 
						
 Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- The army and people of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea (DPRK) are united close  around the party and the leader with the same intention and feelings to emerge victorious in the do-or-die battles fought against the U.S. imperialist aggressors. This recorded truth in the history of the struggle for human emancipation that all-people resistance based on love and trust is sure to triumph. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday says this in a jointly signed article. 
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The victory won in the Fatherland Liberation War (Korean War) under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung was the one achieved thanks to the warmest love and deepest trust. 
					
					 The historic victory in the war taught the immutable truth that a country will remain ever-victorious when it is led by the supreme commander who deeply trusts and warmly loves the army and people. 
					
					 The world history records many generals who won fame in battles, but it does not know such great brilliant commander as Kim Il Sung who showed warm love for all the service personnel and people during the wartime and led the hard-fought war to victory. 
					
					 Thanks to the wise leadership of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, the DPRK has demonstrated its might as a country of single-minded unity where the leader, party and masses formed a harmonious whole and as an invincible country with tremendous national power  for decades. 
					
					 The love and trust between the leader and the people, the source of unity and victory of Songun Korea, is now being carried forward at the highest level by Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 It is the political creed of Kim Jong Un that trust means victory and trust means the single-minded unity of the DPRK. 
					
					 Warm love and trust serves as the most powerful treasured sword for winning a decisive victory in the future showdown with the U.S. 
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will tightly hold the strong arms of the revolution, arms of class, and surely win victory in the anti-U.S. struggle guided by the philosophy of love and trust. 
					
					 Love and trust are the main source of strength which helps fully display the beautiful traits of army-people unity, the roots of our society. 
					
					 The might of army-people coordinated operation for building a thriving nation is being fully displayed thanks to the close bonds between servicepersons and people. 
					
					 It is the great pride for the army and people of the DPRK to glorify forever the history of war victory in which the principle of love and trust has been applied.

articles.title: "UN Command" Should Be Dismantled: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
"UN Command" Should Be Dismantled: Rodong Sinmun
						
 Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- If peace is to settle on the Korean Peninsula and in its vicinity, it is necessary to get the "UN Command" in south Korea dismantled and the U.S. troops withdrawn from south Korea as soon as possible.
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday says this in a bylined commentary.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 As long as the "UN Command" remains in south Korea, it is absolutely impossible to ensure peace and stability on the peninsula.
					
					 The "UN Command" has been used as a tool for the U.S. to justify the maneuvers escalating the tension. If this ghost-like machine is allowed to stay, this will only increase the danger of war.
					
					 What is the most urgent for defusing the tension on the peninsula at present is to remove helmets of "UN Forces" from the U.S. troops and force them out of south Korea as early as possible.
					
					 The dismantlement of the "UN Command" would help deprive the U.S. of a legal lever for straining the situation on the peninsula and igniting a war and a crafty smokescreen for covering up its aggressive nature. The pullback of the U.S. troops from south Korea would help completely defuse the danger of war caused by foreign forces.
					
					 It would also be beneficial for the peace and stability in the Asia-Pacific.
					
					 The dismantlement of the "UN Command" is urgently necessary for preventing the start of a new Cold War in the Asia-Pacific.
					
					 If the U.S. disbands the command, this will be one of the actions which will prove that it has no hostile intent on the DPRK.
					
					 This would also exert a positive influence on the confidence building between the DPRK and the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. should not be keen on the existence of the command and its strengthening but positively opt for dismantling it.

articles.title: S. Korea's Moves to Defer Again Transfer of OPECON Denounced
articles.content:
S. Korea's Moves to Defer Again Transfer of OPECON Denounced 
						
 Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- The south Korean regime is  negotiating with the U.S. the issue of postponing again the transfer of wartime operation control (OPECON) from the U.S. South Korea reportedly raised the issue in March. 
					 Minju Joson Sunday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard: 
					
					 The attempt of the present ruling quarters of south Korea to defer again the transfer of OPECON which had already been postponed by the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors is an unpardonable mockery and an insult not only to the south Korean people but to all other Koreans.
					
					 The ulterior aim sought by them in deferring the transfer of OPECON is to keep the U.S. troops in south Korea for an indefinite period and do harm to fellow countrymen with their help, the commentary notes, and goes on: 
					
					 They have frantically staged north-targeted war exercises in collusion with the U.S., introducing latest war equipment from different countries and giving spurs to developing latest weaponry including landing and mobile copters. 
					
					 The above-said moves will only increase the U.S. political, military and economic domination and subjugation of south Korea. 
					
					 In the final analysis, their moves will bring bigger misfortune and sufferings to the south Korean people and increase the danger of war on the Korean Peninsula. 
					
					 The south Korean people should never allow the puppet regime to defer the transfer of OPECON as it will bring a horrible war disaster to the nation.

articles.title: Ulji Drills to Be Staged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Ulji Drills to Be Staged in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- South Korean warmongers announced that they would stage Ulji drills from August 19 to 22 across south Korea, according to the south Korean Yonhap News.
					 The drills will reportedly involve 410 000 people from at least 4 000 institutions including administrative bodies at city, county and district levels and above.
					
					 The puppet "government" authorities slandered the DPRK and fanned up the hysteria of invading the north before the chiefs of the national administrative bodies, governors and commanding officers of the army at the "government" building.
					
					 They are persisting in their large-scale war drills against the DPRK, pursuant to the U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK despite the nation's desire for peaceful reunification.

articles.title: South Korean Regime Accused of Suppressing Pro-reunification Organization
articles.content:
South Korean Regime Accused of Suppressing Pro-reunification Organization 
 Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-National Alliance for Korea's Reunification made public a commentary on July 17 in protest against the puppet regime's suppression of its members. 
					 The commentary accused the Security Investigation Group of the Police Agency of arresting without any notice Kim Se Chang, a member of the organization, that day.
					
					 The regime arrested the core member of the organization active for national reconciliation, unity, peace and reunification, at a time when the working talks were under way for normalizing the operation in the Kaesong Industrial Zone amid concern of all compatriots, the commentary noted.
					
					 It vehemently denounced the regime for committing such thrice-cursed outrage as putting the seriously ailing Kim in custody.
					
					 It slammed the regime for its ceaseless suppression of members of the organization.
					
					 The present regime is following in the footsteps of dictator Park Chung Hee regime which wantonly violated democracy, human rights and life, it charged, and continued:
					
					 The suppression of the righteous struggle for national reunification is unpardonable.
					
					 It urged the present regime to stop the unwarranted suppression of the headquarters and release Kim Se Chang and other pro-reunification patriots at once.

articles.title: Candlelight Action Unabated in S. Korea
articles.content:
Candlelight Action Unabated in S. Korea 
						
 Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- A candlelight action took place at Seoul Square on Friday in demand of probe into truth behind the case of the interference of the Intelligence Service (IS) in the election under the sponsorship of the Emergency Situation Council to Denounce IS's Interference in Presidential Election for Political Operation which consists of more than 200 civic and social organizations. 
					 More than 10 000 people from all walks of life took part in the action. Among them were representatives of civic and social organizations, lawmakers from opposition parties, citizens, workers, university students and schoolchildren. 
					
					 Speakers at the meeting said that students have staged candlelight actions for a month and even schoolchildren have taken to streets to wage a movement for issuing declarations on the situation to denounce the illegal actions of the IS. 
					
					 However, a proper investigation has not yet been conducted into the case and media are shutting their eyes to it, they said, urging the "Saenuri Party" not to block the investigation into the IS case.

articles.title: Korean Social Scientists in Japan Mark Day of Victory in War
articles.content:
Korean Social Scientists in Japan Mark Day of Victory in War 
						
 Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- A seminar of Korean social scientists in Japan took place at the Korean Publishing House in Tokyo on Friday to celebrate the 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War (Korean War). 
					 Present at the seminar were Pae Ik Ju, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon); Han Tong Song, director of the Department for Publicity and Culture; Kim Hwa Hyo, chairman of the Korean Social Scientists Association in Japan, and members of the association, leading officials of Chongryon organizations and enterprises, teachers of Korea University, Chongryon officials and other Koreans in Kanto area. 
					
					 Speakers said that the Armistice Agreement has lasted for six decades owing to the U.S. seeking the permanent division of the Korean Peninsula and it has thrown a stumbling block in the way of meeting the interests of the Korean nation and the effort of the DPRK to build a thriving socialist nation. 
					
					 The U.S. listed the DPRK as a target of its preemptive nuclear attack and has persistently pursued a hostile policy towards it including anti-DPRK military drills and economic sanctions, they said, adding:
					
					 The conclusion of a peace treaty between the DPRK and the U.S. will be of great significance in world history in the sense that it will mean a final settlement of the issue of the Korean Peninsula and a genuine end of the Cold War and mark a final occasion of collapse of the "U.S. domination system". 
					
					 They reiterated their will to remain true to the leadership of Kim Jong Un, who is victoriously leading the final standoff with the U.S., and work hard to perform the historic mission of struggling alongside the people in the homeland.

articles.title: Application of Tuition Waiver Program to Korean Schools Urged
articles.content:
Application of Tuition Waiver Program to Korean Schools Urged
						
 Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- The Liaison Council of Graduates from Korean High Schools held a rally at a hall of members of House of Councilors in Tokyo on July 12 demanding the application of tuition waiver program for high schools to Korean schools in Japan.
					 Attending the rally were students of Korea University, those related to Korean schools, parents and representatives of organizations at all levels. Relevant officials of Japanese organizations -- the Liaison Council against Exclusion of Korean schools and Forum Peace, Human Rights and Environment -- also attended.
					
					 Shown there was a video footage of protest actions waged by students of Korea University from late May for the settlement of the issue for aiding Korean schools.
					
					 The reporter called for struggling for the settlement of the issue in unity, explaining that the exclusion of Korean schools from the tuition waiver program is attributable to the Japanese government's wrong understanding of history.
					
					 Speakers said Japanese citizens are joining Koreans in Japan and the joint efforts will for sure bring about a change to the Japanese government's policy of discriminating against Koreans.
					
					 An appeal was read out at the rally.
					
					 Earlier, students of Korea University under the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan waged a huge protest action outside the Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology.
					
					 More than 450 Koreans in Japan and Japanese citizens took part in it.
					
					 Even though the Japanese government excluded Korean schools from the program, Japan is obliged to aid Korean schools in the light of its colonial rule over Korea in the past, they stressed.

articles.title: Disbandment of IS, Resignation of Park Geun Hye Urged
articles.content:
Disbandment of IS, Resignation of Park Geun Hye Urged
						
 Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- Koreans in the U.S. launched a protest action on July 16 outside the Consulate General of south Korea in New York denouncing the interference of the south Korean Intelligence Service (IS) in election.
					 Protesters shouted "We demand disbandment of IS and resignation of Park Geun Hye!", "We censure IS's interference in election" and "Punish the mastermind behind IS's interference in election!"
					
					 They said there are unabated protests not only in south Korea but everywhere Koreans reside following the disclosure of the truth about the IS's illegal and organized interference in the election to make the candidate from the ruling party win the election during the past "presidential election".
					
					 Park Chung-hee committed a military coup and Park Geun Hye an election coup, they said.
					
					 They stressed the need to thoroughly probe the truth behind the IS's interference in election and punish those responsible. They urged the present chief executive to step down for violating law. -0-

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Laos
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Laos
						
 Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un's work "On Effecting a Drastic Turn in Land Management to Meet the Requirements for Building a Thriving Socialist Nation" was published in booklet by the Lao State Publishing House on July 16.
					 The work, published on April 27, Juche 101 (2012), deals with the undying feats performed  by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in land management. It also indicates the general orientation and ways for face-lifting the land of the country as befitting a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: Anniversary of DPRK's Victory in War Observed by Foreign Newspapers
articles.content:
Anniversary of DPRK's Victory in War Observed by Foreign Newspapers
						
 Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- Foreign newspapers and broadcasting services devoted special write-ups and special programs to the 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Under the headline "Exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung for victory in war" the Russian newspaper Komsomolskaya Pravda on July 9 allotted one whole page to a photo of President Kim Il Sung and articles subtitled "General's distinguished ability", "The unity of army and people", "Preeminent strategy and tactics", "Creation of diverse war methods " and "Consolidation of the political and military position of the country."
					
					 Noting that the victory of the Korean people in the Fatherland Liberation War was a brilliant fruition of the original military idea and war methods of Kim Il Sung, the paper gave a detailed account of the fact.
					
					 The Malaysian Guang Ming Daily on July 12 carried an article under the title of the "Celebration of the 60th anniversary of victory in the Fatherland Liberation War" and an article subtitled the "Might of the single minded unity brought about the victory in the war" illustrated with a portrait of smiling Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The paper said that inspired by the paternal love shown by  Kim Il Sung for the service personnel during the days of the hard-fought war, they fought against the enemy, unhesitatingly dedicating their youth and lives.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The might of the single-minded unity between the supreme commander and soldiers and between the leader and the people brought about the victory in the war.
					
					 Such noble spirit of revolutionary obligation is being successfully carried forward by Marshal Kim Jong Un, faithful successor to the cause of the great leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Under the headline "Myth smashed, new myth" the Bangladeshi newspaper Natun Bangla on July 13 carried an article telling how the myth of the U.S. "mightiness" was shattered to smithereens in the last Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 The Teleandina TV broadcasting service 23 of Ecuador on July 9 and 10 specially aired the Korean films "Reply of the DPRK" and "Fireworks of a thriving nation."

articles.title: President Kim Il Sung Remembered in Russia, Ukraine
articles.content:
President Kim Il Sung Remembered in Russia, Ukraine
						
 Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- Special write-ups were posted on internet homepages of Russia and Ukraine on July 6 on the occasion of the 19th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung and the 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The Russian internet homepage "Mega Mir" was featured by articles illustrated with a photo of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and photos dealing with the revolutionary activities of them and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The homepage said under the title "Father of people" that Kim Il Sung shared joy and sorrow with the people, always finding himself among them. 
					
					 Kim Il Sung took deep care of the living of the people down to all details. Whenever he visited a farm, he consulted with farmers about farming. Whenever he visited a factory, he shook workers' hands stained with oil and whenever he called on houses of workers, he opened cooking pots to know what food was being prepared.
					
					 Kim Il Sung deemed it his primary obligation and greatest pleasure to serve the people.
					
					 The Ukrainian Branch of the All-Union Communist Party of Bolsheviks of Russia posted on its homepage an article titled the "Democratic People's Republic of Korea."
					
					 It said: The great Fatherland Liberation War fought against the U.S. imperialists fully demonstrated the spirit and the mettle of the Korean people who were devotedly struggling for the freedom and the independence of the country, united close around the party and the leader.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung defeated the U.S. imperialists who were superior in numerical strength and technical equipment.

articles.title: Anniversary of DPRK's Day of Victory in War Observed in Democratic Congo
articles.content:
Anniversary of DPRK's Day of Victory in War Observed in Democratic Congo
						
 Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the 60th anniversary of the victory of the Korean people in the great Fatherland Liberation War published a bulletin on July 15 under the title "July 27, 2013, the world greets the 60th anniversary of the victory of the Korean people in the great Fatherland Liberation War."
					 The bulletin carried an article praising the exploits President Kim Il Sung performed for the victory in the war and the personality of Marshal Kim Jong Un as a great man under the title "Generalissimo Kim Il Sung and his undying exploits", "Ceasefire is not peace" and "Kim Jong Un, a staunch guardian of national sovereignty."
					
					 It said that the U.S. ignited the Korean war on June 25, 1950 in order to nip the less than two years old DPRK in the bud and realize its ambition for dominating the world.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 But the Korean People's Army made a drive like wild waves in response to the order of Kim Il Sung to go over to a counter-attack, liberating Seoul in just three days. 
					
					 The President inflicted wholesale death upon the numerically stronger U.S. imperialists by displaying matchless grit and applying Juche-based war methods in the whole period of the war.
					
					 He took deep care of the service personnel with boundless fatherly love and led them to victory. He thus humbled the pride of the U.S. imperialists on July 27, 1953 and won a great victory in the war.
					
					 Kim Jong Un, who is identical to Kim Il Sung, is leading the Korean people in the struggle for smashing the U.S. and other hostile forces' moves to stifle the DPRK and defending the sovereignty of the country with his outstanding political caliber.

articles.title: Anniversary of DPRK's Victory in War Marked in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Anniversary of DPRK's Victory in War Marked in Foreign Countries 
						
 Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- Foreign political parties and organizations posted special write-ups on their internet websites on July 14 and 15 on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The Socialist Party of Romania posted on its website an article titled "Generalissimo Kim Il Sung".
					
					 The article said:
					
					 The U.S. provoked the Korean War with huge troops and large quantities of military equipment involved, bragging about its "victory."
					
					 The world was concerned over the destiny of the DPRK.
					
					 But the results were quite contrary to Washington's calculation.
					
					 The less than two years old DPRK defeated the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces.
					
					 The miracle wrought by the Korean people was the brilliant victory brought about by Generalissimo Kim Il Sung with his outstanding strategies and tactics, original war methods and commanding art.
					
					 He applied ever-changing flexible strategies and tactics, always taking the initiative in every period and at each stage of war. The U.S. imperialists were compelled to bend their knees before the DPRK though they boasted of their military and technological superiority. 
					
					 The Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK posted on its website an article titled "July 27, 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War" illustrated with photos on revolutionary activities of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The article cited facts about signal battle results the servicepersons of the Korean People's Army achieved in the sky, land and seas in the past war under the outstanding leadership of the President.
					
					 The Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship posted the following article on its website:
					
					 Generalissimo Kim Il Sung, who always lives in the hearts of the mankind, was a peerless strategist who beat back the invasion by the U.S. imperialists with his Juche-oriented and original strategies and tactics and war methods.
					
					 The U.S. generals who had boasted of being "invincible" signed a document of surrender after sustaining repeated setbacks in face of Mt. Paektu-style strategies, tactics and war methods of the President.
